It is the most comprehensive news, entertainment and sport guide you could ever wish for â so donât miss out, download the Eastern Eye app now and enjoy being in the thick of everything.Features:â¢Eastern Eye continues to chart the success and development of the community at all levels.â¢There are regular columns by leading names, including cabinet ministers, opposition figures and industry leaders, as well as weekly dose of sense and sensibility from former Fleet Street veteran, Amit Roy.â¢Alongside its unparalleled UK Asian news coverage, there are extensive sections on entertainment, Bollywood and sport.â¢E-guide is the source of information on everything from music, lifestyle and health, and includes the ever popular and very distinct Eye-Spy, as compiled by Bollywood aficionado, Asjad Nazir.
